last_episode_to_air.name: Forever
last_episode_to_air.overview: Nathan struggles to return to Haven as Dwight reconsiders his future in the series finale, which also finds Audrey coming to a terrifying decision about how she might finally save the town from Croatoan.

name: Haven
overview: FBI agent Audrey Parker arrives in the small town of Haven, Maine to solve a murder and soon discovers the town's many secrets—which also hold the key to unlocking the mysteries of her lost past.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: FBI agent Audrey Parker arrives in the town of Haven, Maine on a routine case and her knack for unraveling mysteries proves an asset when she discovers that the seemingly sleepy town is, in fact, a longtime refuge for people with supernatural afflictions. Among the townspeople are local cop Nathan Wuornos, who eventually becomes Audrey's partner, and the mysterious and charming Duke Crocker.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Audrey Parker must not only stay on top of Haven's many afflictions, but she must also solve her most challenging case yet: the secret of her own lost past and its ties to Haven. With the help of Nathan Wuornos, a handsome local cop with his own trouble, and Duke Crocker, a local smuggler and reluctant aide in solving Haven's troubles, Audrey digs deeper into uncovering her identity.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Season three picks up immediately following the events of the gripping season two finale with Audrey having been kidnapped; Nathan warned against pursuing a romantic relationship with Audrey; and Duke seemingly engaged in a fight to the death with Nathan after he discovers his family lineage is to kill "troubled" citizens of Haven.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Season four picks up six months after the town was pummeled by a violent meteor storm and Audrey and Duke vanished into thin air, leaving an injured Nathan marooned in Haven.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: Haven's protectors are thrust into uncharted waters: Duke is now a ticking time bomb, fighting to contain the Troubles within him, while Nathan faces his greatest fear that Audrey—the woman he's fought so desperately to save—may be gone forever.

episodes.name: Welcome to Haven
episodes.overview: FBI agent Audrey Parker travels to the town of Haven to investigate the death of an escaped prisoner who fled to his hometown. She soon discovers the man's death is merely the tip of a very large iceberg of supernatural phenomena.

episodes.name: Butterfly
episodes.overview: Audrey remains in Haven to investigate her mother's connection to the Colorado Kid, but ends up working with Nathan to determine the cause of a mysterious series of incidents that involve butterflies and otherworldly phenomena centered on a angry reverend, his passive daughter, and her foster son.

episodes.name: Harmony
episodes.overview: A plague of insanity strikes at a local hospital, causing the doctors to go insane... and the patients to become normal. Audrey and Nathan seek to discover the cause before it spreads further.

episodes.name: Consumed
episodes.overview: Haven is stricken by a mysterious plague when animals and plants alike are destroyed by exposure to hydrochloric acid with no discernible source.

episodes.name: Ball and Chain
episodes.overview: Young men in Haven start aging at an accelerated rate, and Audrey and Nathan attempt to find the source.

episodes.name: Fur
episodes.overview: A series of fatal animal attacks lead Audrey and Nathan to investigate a local woman who supports animal rights. However, they soon discover that while she may not be Troubled, the person responsible is... and Chief Wournos is the next target.

episodes.name: Sketchy
episodes.overview: Two mysterious assaults involve crooked businessmen, and sketching charcoal is found at each crime scene. However, the boy the officers suspect is responsible becomes a third victim, leaving them to pursue a new line of investigation.

episodes.name: Ain't No Sunshine
episodes.overview: Audrey and Nathan learn of a ghost story that wanders the Haven clinic and takes the lives of sick people before their time.

episodes.name: As You Were
episodes.overview: Audrey's surprise birthday party at a local hotel goes awry when a shapeshifter stalks the partygoers, and nobody knows who can be trusted.

episodes.name: The Hand You're Dealt
episodes.overview: Nathan and Audrey investigate a series of murders, but the prime suspect insists that she's trying to stop the real killer. Meanwhile, in the aftermath of Duke's revelation, Audrey continues to investigate the Colorado Kid mystery involving her mother.

episodes.name: The Trial of Audrey Parker
episodes.overview: Audrey joins in a friendly game of poker aboard Duke's ship, but the two new players soon lock everyone up and try to find a box that Duke is smuggling. Meanwhile, Audrey's boss arrives in town and demands answers.

episodes.name: Resurfacing
episodes.overview: Audrey and Nathan investigate when a gust of wind seemingly throws a woman into a wall following an argument, and the FBI agent suspects some children may have telekinetic powers.

episodes.name: Spiral
episodes.overview: As the mysterious cracks spread throughout Haven at an increasing rate, a mysterious criminal returns to Haven and Audrey discovers the secrets of her past and her mother's.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: FBI agent Audrey Parker arrives in the town of Haven, Maine on a routine case and her knack for unraveling mysteries proves an asset when she discovers that the seemingly sleepy town is, in fact, a longtime refuge for people with supernatural afflictions. Among the townspeople are local cop Nathan Wuornos, who eventually becomes Audrey's partner, and the mysterious and charming Duke Crocker.

episodes.name: A Tale of Two Audreys
episodes.overview: Haven is beset by biblical plagues. Duke continues looking for information on the tattoo, with a little help from his past. Audrey and Nathan check out Audrey II, and try to figure out what to do about Chief Wuornos.

episodes.name: Fear & Loathing
episodes.overview: The residents of Haven have their worst fears come to life while Nathan's "trouble" seems to vanish.

episodes.name: Love Machine
episodes.overview: The town's docks start attacking people while the other Audrey Parker probes Audrey's identity crisis.

episodes.name: Sparks and Recreation
episodes.overview: When a deadly series of electrocutions occur around town, Audrey and Nathan investigate the cause

episodes.name: Roots
episodes.overview: A wedding at an isolated estate turns deadly for the guests when the site becomes sealed off and something attacks from within.

episodes.name: Audrey Parker's Day Off
episodes.overview: A single day keeps repeating for Audrey, who finds a deadly accident linked to the phenomenon.

episodes.name: The Tides That Bind
episodes.overview: A drowning case exposes a secretive family compound on the outskirts of Haven, from which children have disappeared under mysterious circumstances.

episodes.name: Friend or Faux
episodes.overview: A banker hides a dark secret that connects him to a killer hiding in Haven. Meanwhile, Duke helps a young runaway and Nathan discovers that his job is at risk.

episodes.name: Lockdown
episodes.overview: When a Troubled individual unleashes a rotting plague inside the police station, the new Chief orders a quarantine... trapping Audrey and the others inside. Meanwhile, Duke confronts Evi about her betrayal of him.

episodes.name: Who, What, Where, Wendigo?
episodes.overview: Audrey and Nathan take a search party into the woods to find a missing boy whose disappearance may be connected to the Troubles, and receive some unwanted help from Driscoll.

episodes.name: Business as Usual
episodes.overview: With Nathan's help, Audrey finally locates Lucy Ripley and goes to confront her. Meanwhile, Duke and Dwight join forces to discover what Duke's father Simon left for his son.

episodes.name: Sins of the Fathers
episodes.overview: Haven's dead rise from their graves to reveal the town's secrets... and those of Audrey, Nathan, and Duke.

episodes.name: Silent Night
episodes.overview: Audrey is the only one who realizes that there are Christmas decorations in July that no one else finds unusual. The out-of-season decorations are only a prelude to the bizarre bisection of a surfer and a series of escalating disappearances of people who no one can remember except Audrey.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Audrey Parker must not only stay on top of Haven's many afflictions, but she must also solve her most challenging case yet: the secret of her own lost past and its ties to Haven. With the help of Nathan Wuornos, a handsome local cop with his own trouble, and Duke Crocker, a local smuggler and reluctant aide in solving Haven's troubles, Audrey digs deeper into uncovering her identity.

episodes.overview: While Nathan and Duke set aside their differences and try to find Audrey, a Troubled individual is plagued by alien abductors.

episodes.name: Stay
episodes.overview: Naked savages wander the streets of Haven. While Nathan and Audrey try to determine who they are and where they've come from, Duke convinces the Teagues to let him see the old newspapers and determine who the mysterious "Hunter" is and how he's connected to Audrey.

episodes.name: The Farmer
episodes.overview: Audrey and Nathan encounter a bizarre series of deaths suggesting a serial killer, with a unique “trouble”, is at work in Haven. Meanwhile, a Boston cop tries linking the town's latest body to similar cases.

episodes.name: Over My Head
episodes.overview: Audrey and Nathan investigate a series of strange incidents where the only common factor is a missing woman. Meanwhile, Duke insists on tailing along on the officers' investigation, while the Teagues do some digging on Tommy's background.

episodes.name: Double Jeopardy
episodes.overview: A female vigilante stalks Haven's criminals, rendering poetic justice. Meanwhile, Nathan grows closer to Jordan as he attempts to infiltrate the Guard, and Audrey learns more about the bolt-gun killer that is stalking her.

episodes.name: Real Estate
episodes.overview: On Halloween night, Audrey, Nathan and Duke become trapped inside a haunted house.

episodes.name: Magic Hour (1)
episodes.overview: While Audrey and Duke track down the Colorado Kid's parents, Nathan and Tommy investigate Troubled incidents involving the resurrection of dead for payment.

episodes.name: Magic Hour (2)
episodes.overview: Audrey and Duke return from Colorado. Audrey, Duke and Tommy try to find the woman with the resurrection touch. Meanwhile, the Teagues realizes that the Bolt Gun Killer has tricked them and track the murderer to his real target.

episodes.name: Sarah
episodes.overview: A Troubled war veteran sends Duke and Nathan back to 1955. Meanwhile, in the present Audrey tries to deal with an altered timeline where Driscoll's men have taken over the town.

episodes.name: Burned
episodes.overview: While helping a little girl whose "trouble" is the ability to make people do what she wants Audrey also gathers clues to the identity of the Bolt Gun Killer.

episodes.name: Last Goodbyes
episodes.overview: When Haven falls into a deep sleep, Audrey must work with the only other person awake in town. Meanwhile, more questions arise about the Bolt Gun Killer.

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.overview: Nathan and Duke try to help Audrey search for a troubled killer after a string of murders take place at the Haven High School.

episodes.name: Thanks for the Memories
episodes.overview: As Audrey grapples with her fate; at the same time she, Nathan and Duke prepare for a showdown with the Bolt Gun Killer.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Season three picks up immediately following the events of the gripping season two finale with Audrey having been kidnapped; Nathan warned against pursuing a romantic relationship with Audrey; and Duke seemingly engaged in a fight to the death with Nathan after he discovers his family lineage is to kill "troubled" citizens of Haven.

episodes.name: Fallout
episodes.overview: Duke is ejected from the barn and rescued by a young woman; Audrey is missing and the Troubles are worse than ever.

episodes.name: Survivors
episodes.overview: As charred bodies are uncovered around Haven, Duke must refocus Nathan to solve the case at hand.

episodes.name: Bad Blood
episodes.overview: Nathan and Dwight race to search for the trouble behind a series of exsanguinated corpses; Duke must convince his half-brother to leave Haven before he learns the truth of the Crocker family trouble.

episodes.name: Lost and Found
episodes.overview: Nathan and Dwight investigate missing children linked to an ancient legend, while Duke tries to find Audrey by focusing Jennifer's trouble.

episodes.name: The New Girl
episodes.overview: Lexie, the new girl in town, joins Nathan on a hunt for a deadly trouble that changes its victims' personalities.

episodes.name: Countdown
episodes.overview: Nathan, Duke, and Lexie find themselves in a race against time to find the troubled person responsible for turning people hard as stone.

episodes.name: Lay Me Down
episodes.overview: Nathan and Lexie hunt a trouble that attacks Haven's citizens in their nightmares; Duke deals with the nightmare his brother has become.

episodes.name: Crush
episodes.overview: A deadly sea trouble threatens to crush the town.

episodes.name: William
episodes.overview: Audrey believes the thugs from the barn are holding William as a hostage.

episodes.name: The Trouble with Troubles
episodes.overview: Audrey finds herself in a different Haven where troubles don't exist.

episodes.name: Shot in the Dark
episodes.overview: The Seekers follow a monster to Haven; their presence threatens to reveal the town's troubles to the entire world.

episodes.name: When the Bough Breaks
episodes.overview: William is determined to convince Audrey of the truth behind her origins; a seemingly unstoppable curse is unleashed.

episodes.name: The Lighthouse
episodes.overview: Audrey fights to remain herself as she tracks down William to sever their ethereal connection

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: Season four picks up six months after the town was pummeled by a violent meteor storm and Audrey and Duke vanished into thin air, leaving an injured Nathan marooned in Haven.

episodes.name: See No Evil
episodes.overview: Audrey, Nathan and Duke's victory over William feels hollow as they deal with the aftermath of Duke on death's door, Mara in control of Audrey's body, and a strange trouble supernaturally silencing citizens all over town.

episodes.name: Speak No Evil
episodes.overview: Duke struggles to accept Jennifer's death; Nathan searches for some shred of Audrey in Mara's cruel personality; Dwight shoulders the heavy burden of holding Haven together.

episodes.name: Spotlight
episodes.overview: Nathan makes a desperate play to protect Mara from the furious citizens of Haven, leaving Dwight and Duke to deal with a deadly trouble that threatens to burn the town to the ground.

episodes.name: Much Ado About Mara
episodes.overview: Dwight and Nathan clash over what to do about Mara; Dwight wants her to end the troubles at any cost, but Nathan is convinced that Audrey is in there.

episodes.name: The Old Switcheroo (1)
episodes.overview: When Vince and Dave travel to North Carolina, their probing of Dave's past uncovers a body-swapping problem back in Haven.

episodes.name: The Old Switcheroo (2)
episodes.overview: Mara capitalizes on the latest crisis, forcing Duke and Nathan to roll the dice to get Audrey back in a dangerous gamble.

episodes.name: Nowhere Man
episodes.overview: A paranormal trouble tears Audrey and Nathan apart just after they were reunited.

episodes.name: Exposure
episodes.overview: Audrey must call in outside help as she is no longer immune to the troubles and Nathan may be lost forever.

episodes.name: Morbidity
episodes.overview: When Audrey and dozens of Haven citizens are affected by a mysterious illness, the symptoms threaten to expose Haven’s secrets to a dangerous newcomer.

episodes.name: Mortality
episodes.overview: Haven’s heroes are torn over how to deal with an inquisitive CDC scientist, who could expose the secret of the troubles to the world, but may be hiding her own dark agenda.

episodes.name: Reflections
episodes.overview: Duke’s roiling troubles and a new threat to Audrey force them each to seek the help of potentially dangerous allies.

episodes.name: Chemistry
episodes.overview: When a trouble drives Haven’s citizens to pursue their more primal desires, it takes everyone to keep Haven from coming unglued-distracting them from the menacing storm that is brewing.

episodes.name: Chosen
episodes.overview: As Mara'a endgame becomes clear, Nathan and Audrey pursue a plan to stop her once and for all.

episodes.name: New World Order
episodes.overview: Dwight struggles to maintain order when Duke's trouble wreaks havoc around town; at the same time, Audrey and Charlotte work together to drive away a mysterious fog that has everyone trapped in Haven.

episodes.name: Power
episodes.overview: Desperate conditions in Haven lead to a terrified population that's difficult for Dwight to maintain control over; at the same time, Nathan assembles a task force to restore power to the town; and Audrey tries to put an end to the trouble once and for all.

episodes.name: The Trial of Nathan Wuornos
episodes.overview: Dwight and Charlotte work to clear Nathan's name when the citizens of Haven put the lawman on trial. Hoping to buy them time, the brothers Teagues moderate the courtroom proceedings, while Audrey continues her quest to solve the darkness troubles.

episodes.name: Enter Sandman
episodes.overview: Dwight and Charlotte work on a way to free Audrey from the Sandman's stasis before he can trap her in his mind forever; at the same time, Duke tries to help Darkside Seeker Seth Byrne recover his memories of Haven.

episodes.name: Wild Card
episodes.overview: Charlotte and Audrey work on their new plan to eliminate the troubles, but something seems to be thwarting their attempts, and it's up to Nathan and Dwight to get to the bottom of it. Meanwhile, the Teagues brothers search for the mysterious serial killer who's stalking the streets of Haven.

episodes.name: Perditus
episodes.overview: Nathan receives otherworldly help as he works to track down a terrifying killer; and Duke reaches a crossroads after he has an alarming vision of Haven's future.

episodes.name: Just Passing Through
episodes.overview: Nathan and Vince travel back to the year 1983 in order to discover Croatoan's origins in Haven; at the same time, Duke finds himself in grave danger after being apprehended by a mysterious foe.

episodes.name: Close to Home
episodes.overview: Nathan encounters an old adversary after entering the terrible Void; Audrey and Duke deal with the threat of a newly troubled person who wants revenge; at the same time, Dwight tries to help Vince free Dave from Croatoan's grip.

episodes.name: A Matter of Time
episodes.overview: While Duke tries to convince Hallie to reopen the thinny, Nathan tries to escape from the Void where he and William are trapped. Meanwhile, Dave must consider making the ultimate sacrifice to stop Croatoan.

episodes.name: Blind Spot
episodes.overview: Plans for building a new barn are complicated when an old trouble brings the Haven Police Station to life. It's up to Audrey and Nathan to find a way to regain control, but their efforts are hampered when a mysterious killer leaves a wake of bodies right under their noses.

episodes.name: The Widening Gyre
episodes.overview: Nathan and Dwight race to rescue Audrey from Croatoan, but the consequences of Duke's dark destiny wreak havoc on their plans. Meanwhile, Vince contemplates an unusual sacrifice.

episodes.name: Now
episodes.overview: Hope of ending the troubles begins to fade as the heroes struggle to rebuild the Barn in the face of mounting obstacles. And while Dwight is tempted by a surprise gift, Nathan finds himself considering a devastating sacrifice.

episodes.name: Forever
episodes.overview: Nathan struggles to return to Haven as Dwight reconsiders his future in the series finale, which also finds Audrey coming to a terrifying decision about how she might finally save the town from Croatoan.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: Haven's protectors are thrust into uncharted waters: Duke is now a ticking time bomb, fighting to contain the Troubles within him, while Nathan faces his greatest fear that Audrey—the woman he's fought so desperately to save—may be gone forever.
